title: MLB Network Tab
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps: When the user taps to launch the MLB Network tab
custom_expected: Then the MLB Network view will open

title: MLB Network Page Content -- update
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps: When the user is on the MLB Network tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following:

title: Current Show Description
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the MLB Network page in the MLB app
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the top part of the MLB Network page
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

a thumbnail of the program which is currently playing
a Play button on top of the thumbnail 
the program title
program's description
start time in ET of the program

title: Program List
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the MLB Network page in MLB app
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the bottom half of the MLB Network page
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the upcoming program list with the following:

The title of the program
A "Presented by" slug with a brand logo (displayed only when a brand has sponsored a particular MLBN program)
A text description
The start time in ET of the program

title: Authorization - Logged in User
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the MLB Network page in the MLB app
and the user is logged in with an MLB account
and has not previously linked their MLB account with the MLB Network entitlement
custom_steps: When the user taps the Play button
custom_expected: Then a webview will open with the MLB Network MVPD auth flow

title: Successful Authorization - Logged in User
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the MLB Network page in the MLB app
and the user is logged in with an MLB account
and has not previously linked their MLB account with the MLB Network entitlement
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the MVPD auth flow
and successfully logs in with entitled cable credentials
custom_expected:
Then the user's MLB account will be linked to the MLB Network entitlement
and the user will be taken through to the MLB Network linear stream

title: Authorization - User is Not Logged in
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the MLB Network page in the MLB app
and the user is not logged in with an MLB account
custom_steps: When the user taps the Play button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to the app's login screen
where they can either login or create a new account

title: Authorization - User Logs in
custom_preconds: Given the user is not logged in with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user has been taken to the login screen
after tapping the MLB Network Play button
and logs in with a valid account
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken the MLB Network MVPD auth flow in a webview

title: Authorization - User Creates Account
custom_preconds: Given the user is not logged in with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user has been taken to the login screen
after tapping the MLB Network Play button
and creates a new account
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken the MLB Network MVPD auth flow in a webview

title: Successful Authorization - Newly Logged in User
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an MLB account
after logging in or creating a new account via login screen from the MLB Network Play button
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the MVPD auth flow
and successfully logs in with entitled cable credentials
custom_expected:
Then the user's MLB account will be linked to the MLB Network entitlement
and the user will be taken through to the MLB Network linear stream

title: Unsuccessful Authorization
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MLB Network auth flow webview
custom_steps: When the user inputs cable credentials that are not entitled for MLB Network
custom_expected:
Then the user will be presented with an Activation Error message
and video playback will not commence

title: Rotating to Landscape
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the MLB Network page in the MLB app
custom_steps:
When the user rotates the device to Landscape
(when video is not playing)
custom_expected: Then there will be no change to the page layout

title: EXECMLB User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an EXECMLB account
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the MLB Network tab
and taps to launch the MLBN stream
custom_expected:
Then the MLBN stream will launch right away
and the user will never be prompted for MVPD auth

title: Rotate to Landscape During Playback
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps:
When the user is playing back the MLB Network stream in Portrait
and rotates the device to Landscape
custom_expected: Then the video will be resized to consume the entire screen

title: Rotate Back to Portrait During Playback
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps:
When the user is playing back the MLB Network stream in Landscape
and rotates the device back to Portrait
custom_expected:
Then the video will be re-embedded in the playback area view at the top of the page
and the behavior of the embedded video will be similar to the embedded video playback that occurs in the PlayList

title: Autoplay Enabled - Entitled User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has autoplay enabled
and is entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps: When the user navs to the MLB Network tab
custom_expected: Then the MLB Network feed will autoplay

title: Autoplay Enabled - Non Entitled User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has autoplay enabled
but is not yet entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps: When the user navs to the MLB Network tab
custom_expected: Then the user should see the Play button

title: Rotating to Landscape
custom_preconds:
Given the user is viewing the MLB Network page in the MLB app
and the device is in Portrait
custom_steps:
When the user rotates the device to Landscape
(when video is not playing)
custom_expected: Then the view will transition into a master-detail style layout similar to what occurs in the PlayList

title: EXECMLB User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an EXECMLB account
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the MLB Network tab
and taps to launch the MLBN stream
custom_expected:
Then the MLBN stream will launch right away
and the user will never be prompted for MVPD auth

title: Rotate to Landscape During Playback
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps:
When the user is playing back the MLB Network stream in Portrait
and the user rotates the device to Landscape
custom_expected:
Then the video will transition into a master-detail style layout similar to what occurs in the PlayList
and the video will continue to play embedded

title: Rotate Back to Portrait During Playback
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps:
When the user is playing back the MLB Network stream
and the device is in Landscape
custom_expected:
Then the video will be re-embedded in the playback area view at the top of the page
and the behavior of the embedded video will be similar to the embedded video playback that occurs in the PlayList

title: Full Screen
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps:
When the user is playing back the MLB Network stream
and taps to bring up the player controls
and taps the Full Screen button
custom_expected:
Then the video will transition to full screen
and playback will be uninterrupted
